str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
